attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It started with Thatcher and as carried on with this goverment.
They ask how much do you earn and can we take it of you in taxes.We now work just to eat and sleep.No pensions, taxed off the road with fuel prices,no descent N.H.S.
LETS STOP THE COUNTRY AND MARCH LETS REVOLT!!!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Statements that don't actually request any action
